title: Textile, "Collection: Great Colors of China", 1970
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed and glazed plain weave
inscribed: Stamped on back at one end: Made in West Germany
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 329.6 x 130.8 cm (10 ft. 9 3/4 in. x 51 1/2 in.) selvedge to selvedge
Repeat H x W: 109.9 x 127 cm (43 1/4 x 50 in.) straight repeat
description: Continuous repeat of three bands across the width of the fabric with white mountain peaks as if in the distance against warm and cool neutral middle tones.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Collection: Great Colors of China", 1970.
1970. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed and glazed plain weave. Gift of Jack Lenor Larsen. 1973-54-4.
